text: Jonathan Daniel "Jon" Hamm (born March 10, 1971) is an American actor and director. He is known for his role as Don Draper in Mad Men. Hamm was born on March 10, 1971 in St. Louis, Missouri. He studied at the University of Missouri. Hamm was partners with Jennifer Westfeldt from 1997 until 2015. Hamm is a Democrat. In 2023, he married actress Anna Osceola. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Jon Hamm at Emmys.com Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Democrats (United States) Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: Jon Hamm
